title: North Country National Scenic Trail: Passport Stamps
body: National Park Service Passport Stamps         National Park Service Park Passport NPS file image  Are you keeping track of the places you visit?  Using the "Passport To Your National Parks" is a great way to record your travels along the North Country National Scenic Trail. Passports may be purchased online as well as at most National Park visitor centers. Each time you visit one of the locations listed below, take your passport book to the "Cancellation Station" typically found in the Visitor Center and ink stamp the date with the official cancellation.  North Country Trail Association 229 E. Main St. Lowell, MI 49331 (866) 445-3628, (616) 897-5987  Huron-Manistee National Forest Forest Supervisors Office 1755 S.
